visual_assets.name: COVID-19 virus
visual_assets.purpose: Represents the SARS-CoV-2 virus with its characteristic spike proteins.
visual_assets.prompt: simple flat cartoon spherical virus covered in distinct spike proteins, neutral color, minimal detail

visual_assets.name: Spike protein key
visual_assets.purpose: Illustrates the spike protein's role as a 'key' for cell entry.
visual_assets.prompt: flat cartoon icon of a viral spike protein shaped like a simple key, abstract design

visual_assets.name: Healthy human cell
visual_assets.purpose: Shows a healthy human cell, the target of viral infection.
visual_assets.prompt: simple flat cartoon healthy human cell, light blue, smooth membrane, minimal detail

visual_assets.name: Cell receptor lock
visual_assets.purpose: Visualizes the cell receptor as a 'lock' on the cell surface.
visual_assets.prompt: flat cartoon icon of a cell surface receptor shaped like a simple lock, abstract design

visual_assets.name: Modified adenovirus
visual_assets.purpose: Represents the harmless viral vector used in the vaccine as a delivery vehicle.
visual_assets.prompt: simple flat cartoon icon of a modified adenovirus, depicted as a small delivery truck, green, minimal detail

visual_assets.name: Genetic instructions
visual_assets.purpose: Symbolizes the genetic material delivered by the vaccine to human cells.
visual_assets.prompt: flat cartoon icon of a rolled-up scroll or instruction sheet, symbolizing genetic code, simple

visual_assets.name: Human cell (producing proteins)
visual_assets.purpose: Shows a human cell taking in vaccine instructions and producing spike proteins.
visual_assets.prompt: simple flat cartoon human cell, pale yellow, with internal elements indicating production of small shapes

visual_assets.name: Isolated Spike proteins
visual_assets.purpose: Represents the harmless spike proteins produced by the vaccinated cell.
visual_assets.prompt: multiple small flat cartoon spike protein icons, identical to the virus spike, floating freely

visual_assets.name: Healthy person silhouette
visual_assets.purpose: Represents the protected individual after vaccination.
visual_assets.prompt: simple flat cartoon silhouette of a healthy person, neutral color, minimal detail

visual_assets.name: Immune defender cells
visual_assets.purpose: Represents various active immune cells (e.g., T-cells) fighting infection.
visual_assets.prompt: simple flat cartoon icons of generic immune cells, depicted as active 'defenders,' dynamic shapes, blue

visual_assets.name: Antibodies
visual_assets.purpose: Shows specific Y-shaped immune proteins that neutralize viruses.
visual_assets.prompt: simple flat cartoon Y-shaped antibody icons, linking to virus, light green

visual_assets.name: COVID-19 virus (target)
visual_assets.purpose: Represents the real virus being targeted and neutralized by the immune system.
visual_assets.prompt: simple flat cartoon spherical virus with spike proteins, same as first segment, minimal detail
